characters: Driver of a grey van, driver of a green taxi
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving in an urban area with moderate traffic. The grey van ahead is moving steadily, while a green taxi on the right side is attempting to merge into the lane. The taxi gradually moves closer to the self-driving vehicle, eventually merging into the lane ahead.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed while keeping a safe distance from the grey van ahead. The vehicle adjusts its position slightly to accommodate the merging taxi on the right side.
key_objects: 1) Front: A grey van, approximately 5 meters away, moving steadily. 2) Right: A green taxi, approximately 2 meters away, merging into the lane.

characters: Driver of a blue taxi, motorcyclist on the right
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving in an urban area with moderate traffic. A blue taxi is ahead, and a motorcyclist is on the right side. The motorcyclist is moving forward and appears to be overtaking the vehicle on the right side.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed and keeping a safe distance from the blue taxi ahead. The vehicle is also monitoring the motorcyclist on the right side, who is overtaking.
key_objects: 1) Front: A blue taxi, approximately 5 meters away, maintaining a steady speed. 2) Right: A motorcyclist, approximately 2 meters away, overtaking the vehicle.
